description: A specialized agent for performing Google search queries and providing comprehensive search results with analysis. Capable of web search, result analysis, and source verification.
name: google_search_agent

skills.name: Web Search
skills.description: Perform comprehensive Google searches and return formatted results

skills.name: Search Result Analysis

skills.name: Information Synthesis
